title: Software Engineering Manager
description:

- Achieved 100% PI objective completion in the first full Program Increment under my leadership

- Cut sprint-to-sprint carry-over by 80%, significantly improving delivery predictability
- Participated in 2 PI Planning events, bridging business stakeholders and engineering
- Fostered direct collaboration between business stakeholders and engineering via joint discovery sessions
